staxel.village.dialogue.PrinceCastlePrim: (안함)Well now! ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! I certainly didn't expect you to show up here!
(안함)How have you been?
(안함)You there! Yes, you! Speak with me a moment.
(안함)This is most fortuitous timing!
(안함)Of late we have been rather short-staffed around here...
(안함)If you were to carry out a few simple tasks, I'm certain we could find a way to reward you suitably...
(안함)What do you say? Will you help us out?
(안함)Sure!
(안함)Maybe another time.
(안함)You certainly look to be quite the reliable individual!
(안함)Ah. That is rather unfortunate.
(안함)Do let me know if you change your mind!
(안함)Had a change of heart, have you?
(안함)Excellent!
(안함)Now, just to ensure that you know what you're doing, we'll start off with an easy task!
(안함)If you proceed through the entryway, you should find yourself in the ^c:1486b0;royal gardens^c:pop;.
(안함)There should be ^c:d03e37;one particular flower^c:pop; which stands out amongst the rest...
(안함)Bring it to me and we'll talk further!
(안함)Ah, excellent! It has been many a year since someone last showed interest in one of these!
(안함)I wonder...could it be...?
(안함)Ah, forgive me. Allow me to be frank with you, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;.
(안함)There was a purpose to sending you for this particular flower.
(안함)Prior to your arrival, we received a letter informing us that we should endeavour to provide you with...^c:d03e37;certain materials^c:pop;.
(안함)This was one of those two materials.
(안함)I must reiterate, however, that we are indeed rather short-staffed and we would greatly appreciate your cooperation.
(안함)If you could perform but one small task, I would be happy to bequeath the other item unto you.
(안함)What say you?
(안함)I suppose I don't have a choice.
(안함)Remember! There should be but ^c:d03e37;one particular flower^c:pop; which stands out amongst the rest!
(안함)Make sure you bring the correct one!
(안함)Well... You could certainly see it that way!
(안함)You need only bring me some of those...what were they called again?
(안함)Ah, yes! ^c:d03e37;Starbits^c:pop;! We don't see them around here very often.
(안함)Perhaps ^c:d03e37;six^c:pop; or so would do?
(안함)I will be eagerly awaiting your return!
(안함)Ah, excellent! We'll be able to make good use of these!
(안함)You'll find the ^c:d03e37;material^c:pop; you need in the tower upstairs.
(안함)The doors should be open to you now.
(안함)I believe it was a ^c:d03e37;slipper^c:pop; of some kind?
(안함)How fares your search for ^c:d03e37;starbits^c:pop;?
(안함)We only need around ^c:d03e37;six^c:pop; or so!
(안함)It was good to have you around, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;!
(안함)Do come and visit again soon!
